title: LEMON PONZU CITRUS SALMON
directions: In a large resealable plastic bag, combine the first eight ingredients, then add salmon. Seal bag and turn to coat. Refrigerate for 1 hour, turning several times. Line an 8 inch square baking dish with foil, then coat the foil with cooking spray. Drain and discard marinade. Place salmon in prepared pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 30-40 minutes, or until fish flakes easily with a fork.
ingredients: ⅓ cup	Ponzu Citrus, seasoned soy sauce
